rules.natural: If the brewmaster has the skill of recipe design, then alcohol is profitable.
Provided that alcohol receives a high rating, if alcohol is produced by a craft brewery, then it is available at a farmers market.
Either alcohol is recalled for a health violation, or if alcohol is marketed via social media, then it receives a high rating.
Whenever alcohol is listed on an online platform, if it is distributed in the local region, then it does not use artificial additives.
Alcohol is listed on an online platform, or it is produced by a craft brewery.
Under the condition that alcohol is produced by a craft brewery, it has the label of organic certification.

Either the brewery is partnered with a distributor, or if alcohol has the label of organic certification, then under the condition that it is distributed in the local region, it does not use artificial additives.
Whenever alcohol is available at a farmers market, if it is distributed in the local region, then it does not use artificial additives.
Provided that it is not the case that the brewmaster has the skill of recipe design, alcohol uses artificial additives.
If the brewmaster does not have the skill of recipe design, then alcohol is distributed in the local region.

(A1 → G).natural: If the brewmaster has the skill of recipe design, then alcohol is profitable.

(A10 → (A5 → A8)).natural: Provided that alcohol receives a high rating, if alcohol is produced by a craft brewery, then it is available at a farmers market.

(A11 ∨ (A9 → A10)).natural: Either alcohol is recalled for a health violation, or if alcohol is marketed via social media, then it receives a high rating.

(A3 → ¬A2).natural: Under the condition that alcohol is distributed in the local region, it does not use artificial additives.

(A4 → (A3 → ¬A2)).natural: Whenever alcohol is listed on an online platform, if it is distributed in the local region, then it does not use artificial additives.

(A4 ∨ A5).natural: Alcohol is listed on an online platform, or it is produced by a craft brewery.

(A5 → (A3 → ¬A2)).natural: If alcohol is produced by a craft brewery, then provided that it is distributed in the local region, it does not use artificial additives.

(A5 → A8).natural: If alcohol is produced by a craft brewery, then it is available at a farmers market.

(A6 → (A3 → ¬A2)).natural: Provided that alcohol has the label of organic certification, if it is distributed in the local region, then it does not use artificial additives.

(A8 → (A3 → ¬A2)).natural: Whenever alcohol is available at a farmers market, if it is distributed in the local region, then it does not use artificial additives.

(A9 → (A5 → A8)).natural: If alcohol is marketed via social media, then provided that it is produced by a craft brewery, it is available at a farmers market.

(A9 → A10).natural: Under the condition that alcohol is marketed via social media, it receives a high rating.

(¬A1 → A2).natural: Provided that it is not the case that the brewmaster has the skill of recipe design, alcohol uses artificial additives.

(¬A1 → A3).natural: If the brewmaster does not have the skill of recipe design, then alcohol is distributed in the local region.
